name: Caffè
description: Our classic Italian espresso made from finely ground coffee beans, delivering a rich and bold flavor that's truly satisfying.

name: Caffè Doppio
description: Double the pleasure with our Caffè Doppio, featuring two shots of intense espresso, offering an extra kick of caffeine to start your day.

name: Cappuccino
description: Indulge in the perfect balance of espresso, steamed milk, and creamy foam in our Cappuccino, topped with a sprinkle of cocoa or cinnamon.

name: Caffè Latte
description: Savor the harmonious blend of espresso and steamed milk in our Caffè Latte, delivering a smooth, comforting taste that's hard to resist.

name: Americano
description: Experience the boldness of espresso married with hot water in our Americano, creating a rich and satisfying coffee with a subtle kick.

name: Macchiato
description: Enjoy the simplicity of our Macchiato, featuring a shot of espresso 'stained' with a dollop of frothy milk for a delightful flavor contrast.

name: Caffè Affogato
description: Indulge in a heavenly dessert-like treat with our Caffè Affogato, where a scoop of velvety gelato is 'drowned' in a shot of hot espresso.
